mapper.select: select s.*, si.serve_type_id as serveTypeId, si.name as serveItemName, si.reference_price as referencePrice, st.name as serveTypeName from serve s inner join serve_item si on s.serve_item_id = si.id inner join serve_type st on si.serve_type_id = st.id where s.region_id = #{regionId}

select st.id as serveTypeId, st.name as serveTypeName, st.img as serveTypeIcon, st.sort_num as serveTypeSortNum, s.city_code as cityCode, s.id as id, s.serve_item_id as serveItemId, si.name as serveItemName, si.serve_item_icon as serveItemIcon, si.sort_num as serveItemSortNum from serve s inner join serve_item si on s.serve_item_id = si.id inner join serve_type st on si.serve_type_id = st.id where s.region_id = #{regionId} and s.sale_status = 2 order by st.sort_num, si.sort_num
